headline.main: SET UP TRANSMITTER, SPY SUSPECT ADMITS; Klein Testifies He Got $25 for Short-Wave Radio

lead_paragraph: Josef Klein, 38-year-old former photo-lithographer, testified yesterday as the Brooklyn espionage trial entered its tenth week that he had received $25 for constructing a short-wave radio transmitter which, the government charges, was used to send Allied shipping information to Germany.
abstract: J A Klein testifies he built radio transmitter for Wheeler-Hill
